jodd.madvoc.result

Class AbstractTemplateViewActionResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.madvoc.result.AbstractTemplateViewActionResult
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionResult
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ServletDispatcherActionResult

    public abstract class AbstractTemplateViewActionResult
extends java.lang.Object
implements ActionResult
    Base class for dispatching results. May be used as base class for any template-based views.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(ActionRequest actionRequest,
                   java.lang.Object resultValue)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Dispatches to the template location created from result value and JSP extension. Does its forward via a RequestDispatcher. If the dispatch fails, a 404 error will be sent back in the http response.
        Specified by:
        render in interface ActionResult
        Parameters:
        actionRequest - action request
        resultValue - action method result, may be null or any type.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • resolveTarget

        protected java.lang.String resolveTarget(ActionRequest actionRequest,
                                         java.lang.String resultValue)
        Locates the target file from action path and the result value.

      • locateTarget

        protected abstract java.lang.String locateTarget(ActionRequest actionRequest,
                                                 java.lang.String path)
        Locates target from given path. Returns founded target or null if target is not found. Path may be modified in different ways to form the target. For example, various extensions may be appended to the path and so on.

      • renderView

        protected abstract void renderView(ActionRequest actionRequest,
                                   java.lang.String target)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Renders the view by processing founded target.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • resultOf

        protected abstract PathResult resultOf(java.lang.Object value)
        Converts different types to path result.

      • targetNotFound

        protected void targetNotFound(ActionRequest actionRequest,
                              java.lang.String actionAndResultPath)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Called when target not found. By default sends 404 to the response.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
